00009 enum BkmxParentingAction
00010 {
00011         // Note: Numbering of these is significant
00012         // Toggling the 3rd lsb shoul toggle between
00013         // corresponding "do" and "undo"
00014         // Also, 3rd lsb indicates "undo"
00015         BkmxParentingAdd = 0x0,  // 0
00016         BkmxParentingRemove,     // 1
00017         BkmxParentingCopy,       // 2
00018         BkmxParentingMove,       // 3
00019         BkmxParentingUndoAdd,    // 4
00020         BkmxParentingUndoRemove, // 5
00021         BkmxParentingUndoCopy,   // 6
00022         BkmxParentingUndoMove    // 7
00023 } ;
00024 
00025 enum BkmxParentingMasks
00026 {
00027         BkmxParentingNone = 0x0,
00028         BkmxParentingUndo = 0x4 
00029 } ;

00031 enum BkmxParentingTweak
00032 {
00033         BkmxParentingTweakNewParentWasCreated = 1 << 0,
00034         BkmxParentingTweakBonehead = 1 << 1,
00035 } ;
